body_html:
refer to bsxfun memory and bsxfun

I doubt that whether bsxfun is lead in with "not repetition" version in Matlab R2007, and after a few years, it's improved to the "repetition except the free memory is not enough" version. Matlab uses lazy allocation memory strategies.
body_text:
refer to bsxfun memory and bsxfun
I doubt that whether bsxfun is lead in with "not repetition" version in Matlab R2007, and after a few years, it's improved to the "repetition except the free memory is not enough" version. Matlab uses lazy allocation memory strategies.
body:
refer to [bsxfun memory](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/28722723/matlab-bsxfun-no-longer-faster-than-repmat) and [bsxfun](http://www.mathworks.com/help/matlab/ref/bsxfun.html)

I doubt that whether `bsxfun` is lead in with "not repetition" version in Matlab R2007, and after a few years, it's improved to the "repetition except the free memory is not enough" version. Matlab uses lazy allocation memory strategies.
